Description:
Detects adversary creating screen capture of a full with xwd. Highly recommended using rule on servers, due high usage of screenshot utilities on user workstations

Author: Pawel Mazur
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Screen Capture with Xwd
Query: sourcetype='linux-auditd' eql select * from _source_ where ((type = 'execve' and a0 = 'xwd') and ((a1 = '-root' and a2 = '-out' and a3 like '%.xwd') or (a1 = '-out' and a2 like '%.xwd')))
